scripts.pre-release: version=$(cat ../postgrest-dist/package.json | jq -r '.version') && postgrestVersion=$(echo $version | sed -e 's/-[0-9]*$//g') && jq '.version = "'$version'"' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && curl -LO https://github.com/PostgREST/postgrest/releases/download/$postgrestVersion/postgrest-$postgrestVersion-linux-static-x64.tar.xz && tar -xvf postgrest-*-linux-static-x64.tar.xz && rm postgrest-*-linux-static-x64.tar.xz
